Name: Novice's Bone Splinter
Description: A skeleton's disembodied index finger imbued with magic and usable as a wand.

Name: Thief's Rusty Knives
Description: A set of knives that have seen better days.

Name: Flameseer's Flickering Wartorch
Description: An ancient weapon of elemental lords bereft of all but a spark.

Name: Obsidian Glaive
Description: A brutal weapon fit for a warlord with a volcanic temper.
